mst06.name: msg_town_mission_silver
mst06.message: Deixe-me dar uma olhada nas suas memórias.\nOuriço azul... Futuro...\nO que essas palavras te lembram?
Pelo visto, você possui muita determinação.
Cooperação
Ódio
Coloque as maçãs dentro dos barris!\nBoa sorte!

Uau! Bom trabalho!
Você não faz ideia do quanto isso me ajudou!
O festival será incrível esse ano! Oh yeah, this is your reward!
It's not much, but it's yours.
Man...\nI would have done a much better job.\nI can't reward you for this.
If I see a robot, I'll probably freeze with fear...\nIf I do, help me, okay!?\fI'll get to see my mom soon, right?
Thank you!\nThis is from mom!

Sonic?
I know him! He helped me when I got stuck on the roof!
He's cool and really nice! You want to know where he went?
I'm sorry, I don't know...
Waaah!\nMommy!
Training will begin!\nGo through every single Ring!\nHere we go!

What...!?
Unbelievable...
Who are you...? Please, join the Soleannan guards!
Please!

Haha! 
I knew you couldn't do it! Only chosen ones can become
Soleanna's soldiers!
Now you know.
Let's start the game!\nGrab the E Gunner model and throw\nit anywhere you like!
Your point total is $.\nYou're good!\nTake this prize!
Your point total is only $?\nI can't give you a prize for that.\nCome back sometime!
John has black and white stripes.\nPucci is a dark brown dog.\nThey're probably wandering in the forest.
Thank you!\nYou can find the other one too, right?

I don't know you, but thank you
for helping me. When Eggman was telling his mechs
to destroy the town gate, I tried to 
stop him. So, he locked me up! You want a pass for the desert?
I'd like to help you, but I need to do something
to protect the gate, first... Please help us out by fighting them off.
If you protect the gate,
I will get your pass right away.
There are five keys.\nThey're probably in the forest somewhere.\nPlease find them!
Thank you, you saved them!\nHere's your reward.
My precious dogs...\nI shouldn't have asked for your help.
There are only a few enemies \nnear the entrance to the forest.\nCarefully escort Anna there please.
Thank you very much for protecting Anna.
I thought you would take good care\nof her...
Let's start the test.\nWatch the first scene closely, and \ntouch what has changed in the next scene!
Question 1 start!
Pretty good. Next question!
This might be the best one yet!\nThis is the last question!

What...?
IQ of... 158... No, 200.
Fabulous...
 Thank you for the wonderful sample.
Here is a small reward for you!
Heh...\nYour IQ turned out to be just as bad as I'd\nthought. No reward for you.
I looked for the 10 medals, but I \ncouldn't find them in places I can get to...\nPlease find all of them!
Thank you! \nMom won't yell at me now. \nWhew!

At the tournament, a team that 
went through 20 Rings won. With my airplane, I could have done
21 Rings. If you can break that record, 
I'll be able to finally let go. Help me!

Thank you! 
Because of you, I feel better now.
Thanks so much!
It's okay.\nWith time, I'll be able to let go eventually...
The first place I went to today is...\nthe shop! I think.

Thank you!
What's the present?
I can't tell you... it's embarrassing. You really want to know?
Umm... no, I can't!
It's a secret between the two of us!
Thanks for your help!\nI wanted to stop them because the town\nis just starting to flourish again.
The first one to reach the goal wins!\nLet's go!

Heh, I'm just warming up.
I haven't shown you anything yet! What? Oh, sorry. 
Someone needs my help!
Got to go, bye!
You did your best, but you didn't \nknow who you were up against.\nI'm the hero, Sonic Man!
Show us what you've got!\nLet's hit it!

Man!
You cleared it so quickly?! Wow! This is among the top scores in
Soleanna's 1500-year history!
You're the man!
I can't tell you with a record like this.\nWeak guys can't be trusted.\nCome back when you're a real man!
Put the ingredients around here!\nThey need to stay fresh, so hurry!

Excellent! Thanks!
Now, I can cook great dishes.
Thanks for your help!
 It's not much, but this is your reward.
Take it!
Oh no, the ingredients...\nI was a fool to ask for your help.
If you can catch all six of us,\nI'll tell you about Sonic! Let's start!
Ow... Okay, you got me.
Ouch, ouch!
Oops, you caught me.
Darn it!
Ouch!
Ouch...\nWow, you caught us all.\nAll right, I'll tell you about Sonic!
Heh.\nIs that all you've got? I'm not telling\nyou anything about Sonic.
Thank you! Things have been crazy after\nthe festival... First Princess Elise, then this...\fWhen is Soleanna's peace coming back?
That red car is mine.\nYou can break it, just stop the car!
I don't know what would've happened.\nThank you so very much!
Oh no!\nMy life is over...\nDarn it!
Find the 10 medals within the time limit!\nGo!
Oh no, you found them all.\nI need to do a better job next time.
Heh, I knew it would be too hard for you.\nI'll take it easy on you next time!
If you see him, please talk to him!

Am I waiting for someone?
How did you know?
Oh, I get it. I'm waiting for something from my aunt.
That's it! Her red sweater If I sling this over my shoulders,
I'm going to kick butt at work.
Thank you!
Thank you! You're great!\nYou found him among all of these people!
Yeah, there's too many people \naround here... too bad.

What...? Why won't it explode?
If I don't do this, I'll be stuck forever 
as an Earl... It's supposed to work perfectly.
What's wrong with it!?
Darn it!
I think there's a secret hidden in this \nwarehouse district. Good luck!

Thank you! There really was a monster...
Thank you for your help. Management is delighted.
This is a reward from our company.
Please take it!

This is your first test!
The Test of Friendship! Show with your actions how much
you value your friends!
Here we go!
You seem to value your friends.\nKeep it up.\nOn to the next test!
You don't value your friends enough.\nRethink how much they mean to you!

This is your third test!
The Test of the Heart! The heart is your true self.
You must fight yourself, and win
in order to pass.
Get to the destination faster than \nyour own shadow! Here we go!

You did it... You overcame yourself.
You have passed the tests of Soleanna,
and proved yourself worthy of the royal family. The route is open!
Go to the Old Castle!
There is still trouble in your heart.\nI cannot allow you to pass...
If you can find the Silver and Bronze\nmedals, I'm sure I can bring alchemy back!

Yes! I was right about you!
Now that I have them, it's back
to my research! Oops, sorry. 
I almost forgot your reward.
Please take this!
It's okay. Maybe trying to bring \nalchemy back is just a hopeless dream...\nI'll have to accept that...
Let's start the Domino Game!\nReady, set, go!\n

Wow! You're all doing great!
A total of $ dominos!
Wonderful score! You are... Mr. Silver?
Mr. Silver will receive a prize! That's it for today!
Tune in tomorrow for another episode
of the Domino Game! See you!
Oh no...!\nThe Domino Game is not as easy as it\nlooks. Stay tuned for more tomorrow!

This is the second test!
The Test of Memory...
Let's see how good your memory is. I'll ask you three questions from 
your past. If you can answer them,
you will pass.
First question!
Impressive.\nOnto the next question!
Here's the last question!
Perfect!\nYou've cleared this test.\nOnto the last test.
Take stock of your past once again!\nThis is important if you want to\nprove yourself worthy of the royal family!
Okay, let's start the Domino Game!\nReady, set, go!

Wow! A new record of $ dominos!!
It's the highest score yet! The winner is Mr. Silver!!
He will receive an amazing prize! How was the Domino Game?
Until next time, adios!

Too bad! Marcos gets the highest score! 
Congratulations, Marcos! This was the Domino Game.
See you next time!
Adios!
Let's start the challenge!\nGo!

Whoa!
I've never imagined anyone cracking this rock.
Wonderful! This is unbelievable! Your strength is truly divine!
Please take the prizes!
Haha, too bad.\nThe only one who can crack it is a god!

Let's begin. You have 0 Rings. 
Enemies will appear one after another,
so you must defeat them. The number of enemies you defeat
within the time limit determines 
your battle power. Ready?
You have defeated $ enemies.\nYou're very powerful!\nYour battle power level is Rank S.
Good job at defeating $ enemies.\nYour battle power level is Rank A.
Let's see... you defeated $ enemies.\nYour battle power level is Rank B.
Let's see... you defeated $ enemies.\nYour battle power level is Rank C.
Let's see... the total number of enemies\nyou defeated was $. Unfortunately, your\nbattle power level is Rank D.
The 1-ball is over there.\nPlease find it and bring it to me.
My boss is very strict, so I was really scared.\nThank you so much!
What? You couldn't find it?\nI'm in big trouble...

This is your first test
The Test of Friendship! Show with your actions how much
you value your friends!
Here we go!
You seem to value your friends.\nKeep it up.\nOn to the next test!
You don't value your friends enough.\nRethink how much they mean to you!

This is your third test!
The Test of Heart! This is about battling the fears deep inside
you. You need to battle the enemy without
using any objects.
There are no objects nearby that you can\nuse your Psychokinesis on.\nAll you can depend on is yourself!

You have faced your fears and overcome the
tests... You have proved yourself worthy of
the royal family. The route is open!
Go to the Old Castle!
Unfortunately, you have not overcome your\ndeepest fears. I cannot allow you to pass\nthe test...
The red barrel is the most dangerous!\nDon't let them touch it!
Oh good! We've prevented the explosion!\nThank you so much!
Oh no!
Mission
Put as many apples in the barrels as \npossible before time runs out!
Take Francesca to her mom!
Go through all the Rings within \nthe time limit!
Grab the E Gunner model, and cause as\nmany crashes as possible! You need to get\nat least $ points to get a prize.
Find John and Pucci!\nTake them to their owner!
Destroy the rock before the bomb\nexplodes! Take the bomb next to \nLord Regis to a safe place and destroy it!
Find five keys and save the dogs\ntrapped in the cages!
Keep Anna safe, and escort \nher to the destination!
Discover Amy's intentions without\nletting her see you!
Touch the places that are different\nbetween the first and the second\nscene!
Find the ten Bronze Medals!
Go through all the Rings\nwithin the time limit!
Follow Valeria's memory and find\nthe lost present!
Defeat the enemies before they reach\nthe town!
Go around the Castle Town once and \nreach the goal before Sonic Man does!
Destroy all the targets within\nthe time limit!
Take all of the ingredients to Collard\nwithin the time limit!
Capture the six children within the time limit!
Defeat all of the enemies!
Stop the red car before it crashes\ninto a building!
Collect ten Bronze medals within\nthe time limit!
Find a young man with brown hair,\nwearing a white shirt, with a blue\nsweater over his shoulders!
The stolen present.
Find out why goods from the \nwarehouse district are disappearing,\nand stop it!
Protect Blaze and defeat all of the enemies!
Get to the goal before your\nalter ego!
Find the Silver and Bronze medals!
Use memories of the past to find Anna,\nwho knows the secret!
Push the switch at the right time \nto make the dominos appear! \nThere's a prize for over $ dominos!
Answer all three questions from the past.\nIf you can do it, you'll pass!
Push the switch at the right time\nto make the dominos appear! \nThere's a prize for over $ dominos!
Attack the divine rock and \ncrack it within the time limit!
Take down all of the enemies with 0 Rings.
Take the 1-ball to Festi!
Save the captured Blaze within \nthe time limit!
Destroy all enemies without any objects\nto use Psychokinesis on!
Defeat the enemies to prevent\nthe barrels from exploding!
Avoid being spotted by the guards\nand get into the station!
Soleanna's Apple Festival
Escort the Lost Child!
The Training Grounds
Crash Game!
Find John and Pucci!
Save Lord Regis!
The Animal Doctor
Protect Anna--\nShe Knows the Secret!
Amy's Secret
Memory Quiz!
The Stolen Bronze Medals
The Airplane Tournament
The Lost Present
Protect the Coastline!
Sonic Man Returns!
The Soleanna \nWater Target Tournament!
The Chef's Ingredients
Catch the Soleanna Boys!
Raid: Evil Monster
Defeat the Pursuers \nand Escort Elise!
Protect the Gate to \nthe Castle Town
Stop the Thieves' Car!
Battle of the Mind: Find \nthe Hidden Bronze Medals!
Find the Waiting Person!
Principality Under Fire 2
Lost Company Property
Soleanna's Test \n(The Test of Friendship)
Soleanna's Test \n(The Test of Heart)
Ancient Alchemy Research
Find Anna--\nShe Knows the Secret!
Domino Game
The Test of Memory
Domino Game \nChampionship Tournament
The Rock of Legend
The Battle Master
The Forgotten 1-Ball
The Test of Friendship
The Test of Heart
Protect the Barrels \nin the Warehouse District!
Get into the station!
Paganini
Francesca
Soleannan Guard
Paolo
Pierre
Lord Regis
Tina
Fanfani
Soleannan Guard
Mikhail
Renzo
Valeria
Soleannan Guard
Sonic Man
Buonarroti
Collard
Pucci
Porta
Liza
Stefano
Jean Marco
Gravina
Muller
Guiberutti
Alan
Alan
Priest
Priest
Priest
Odrich
Moroni
Moroni
Danilo
Zeus
Festi
Priest
Priest
Roberta

First question. What comes to mind with
the words "future," "inferno," and
"ruined city"? If you think "mission," go right.
If you think "escape," go left.

Next question. What comes to mind with
the words "Flames of Disaster," "seal,"
and "ten years ago"? For "Princess Elise," go right.
For "Blaze," go left.

Last question.
What comes to mind with the words
"blue hedgehog"? For "hatred," go right.
For "teamwork," go left.

I have seen into your heart. You may have banished all doubt from
your mind. However, looking back on the past may
be what has calmed the wavering of
your heart. Keep your heart and mind strong as
you proceed to the next battle.
Your heart still falters.\nGoing any further will bring you nothing\nbut despair.
Halt! This area is under high alert!\nEntry is strictly prohibited!\nLeave at once!
Defeat all enemies attacking the town!
Defeat all enemies going after Elise!
Help! Weird monsters are everywhere!
Thank you! The town is saved, thanks to\nyou. As promised, here is the pass to the\ndesert.
Please get rid of them! They will destroy\nthe town!
Renzo
Mikhail
